import React, {useState} from 'react'; export default function AddUser() { // Store information parsed here const [user,setUser]=useState({ name:"", username:"", email:"", }) const{name, username, email}=user const onInputChange=(e)=>{ // the "...user, []" syntax we'll keep on adding the values setUser({...user,[e.target.name]:e.target.value}) } return (
